dcterms:description: The Baby Chillanto Database is a collection of infant cry recordings used for classifying different types of infant cries related to various pathologies. It includes 2267 cry samples labeled by medical professionals, covering categories such as asphyxia, deafness, hunger, normal cries, and pain.
dcterms:title: Baby Chillanto Database

dcterms:description: The Baby2020 Database is a newly developed dataset containing 50 hours of recordings from over 100 infants. It includes 5540 cry samples categorized into three types: hungry, sleepy, and wakeup, recorded in real environments by parents and medical professionals.
dcterms:title: Baby2020 Database
